description: The lightest and most breathable Vapour-Rise built for running in cold conditions. This protective softshell has a body mapped lining to maximise moisture management, with a wind resistant collar and run-ready fit without an ounce of excess fabric.
name: Rab VR Ridgeline Jacket - Mens

specs.value: 20D Pertex® Quantum Air with fluorocarbon-free DWR
